Uses of Class
fast3d.control.Control

  • Packages that use Control 
    Package Description
    fast3d  
    fast3d.control  
    fast3d.simple.controls  

    • Uses of Control in fast3d

      Methods in fast3d that return Control 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Control Panel3d.getControl() 
      Methods in fast3d with parameters of type Control 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Panel3d.setControl(Control c)
      sets the given control to the default one for this
      the controls performInput() method is called on preRender()

    • Uses of Control in fast3d.control

      Subclasses of Control in fast3d.control 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MultiControl
      a very easy to use control: add all the controls you want to apply to a Panel3d to the filed subControls and than add this control to the Panel3d
      at onActivate() all subControls are activated (equivalent at onDeactivate())
      at performInput() all controls are asked to perform their input
      the call to the subControls is in the order, specified by the list
      by call activate() you activate all subControls (similar to deactivate())
      the built-in simple controls do not work together because they override the entire camera-positioning every frame -- controls used by MulitControl should be designed to work together
      class  SimpleControl
      provides some protected fields to easily access the most useful properties of a SimplePanel3d
      sp3d - the cast of p3d to SimplePanel3d framerate - short for sp3d.frameRate() universe - short for sp3d.getUni() cam - short for sp3d.getCam()
      can be used just like a normal control
      Fields in fast3d.control with type parameters of type Control 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.List<Control> MultiControl.subControls
      add all controls that should be applied to the Panel3d here
      Constructors in fast3d.control with parameters of type Control 
      Constructor and Description
      MultiControl(Control... init)
      constructs a plain MultiControl that does nothing but call it's subControls
      Constructor parameters in fast3d.control with type arguments of type Control 
      Constructor and Description
      MultiControl(java.util.List<Control> init, boolean reference)
      constructs a plain MultiControl that does nothing but call it's subControls

    • Uses of Control in fast3d.simple.controls

      Subclasses of Control in fast3d.simple.controls 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LightInvalidationControl
      accomplishes that the lighting-calculation for everything is done in every single frame if activated
      class  RotationAutoControl
      SimpleTopDownRotationAutoControl
      an automated control rotating the camera around the universes center (Vector3d.zero())
      class  RotationControl
      SimpleTopDownRotationUserControl
      works like fast3d.simple.control.autoControl.SimpleTopDownRotationAutoControl but with user input and no auto-rotation
      rotSpeed and zoomSpeed may be adjusted by using the permitted fields
      class  SFPUControl
      SimpleFirstPersonUserControl
      does not check collisions of the camera, not appropriate for games
      WASD to move: W-forward D-right, UP/DOWN for nicking-camera-rotation, LEFT/RIGHT or mouseDrag-cameraRotation, R for up, F for down moving in moveSpeed, rotating in rotSpeed ; speeds may be set directly as fields, L to log stats
      max-rotationX = +- Math.PI/3, no max-rotationY
